summary: Replaces dirt textures of females with freckles.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the dirt textures of females with freckles.

[b][size=3]Dirt color slider = visibility of freckle texture.[/b][/size] Screenshots show high / max visibility.
[b][size=3]Dirt slider = type of freckles.[/size][/b]

Works for all races except Khajiit and Argonian.

Best used together with [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=140] Amazing Smooth Females [/url] or any other mod that removes the blockiness. All screenshots made with smooth faces mod activated.

Feel free so leave suggestions on how to improve this mod.
author: realadry
